subject: Soccer
Homeless Persons
Immigration and Refugees
Athletics and Sports
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Mick Watson has volunteered to coach the U.S. team that will play in the Homeless World Cup soccer tournament, beginning this weekend in Cape Town.
snippet: Mick Watson has volunteered to coach the U.S. team that will play in the Homeless World Cup soccer tournament, beginning this weekend in Cape Town.
